original_text: So Daniel continued to have authority while Darius was king, and also when Cyrus from Persia became king. 6: Persia was the country that we call Iran today. So Daniel continued to have authority while Darius was king, and also when Cyrus from Persia became king.
korean_text: 이 다니엘이 다리오 왕의 시대와 바사 사람 고레스 왕의 시대에 형통하였더라

sentences.original_text: So Daniel continued to have authority
and also when Cyrus from Persia became king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 페르시아의 고레스가 왕이 되었을 때도

sentences.original_text: So Daniel continued to have authority
and also when Cyrus from Persia became king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 페르시아의 고레스가 왕이 되었을 때도
